description: This table contains claim print record information for claims associated with a given hospital account or liability bucket.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: Stores the claim record ID associated with a single hospital account.

columns.name: CLAIM_CAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The claim category.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Capitated


Noncapitated


DME

columns.name: MAIL_NAME
columns.description: The mailing name for this claim.

columns.name: MAIL_CITY_STATE_ZIP
columns.description: The mailing city, state, and ZIP code for this claim.

columns.name: MAIL_PHONE
columns.description: The mailing phone number for this claim.

columns.name: SRC_OF_ADDR_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source of the mailing address for this claim.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Payor


Account


Plan


Coverage


Override

columns.name: LINE_SOURCE_CLP_ID
columns.description: The source claim record for resubmit and demand claims.

columns.name: PARTIAL_CLAIM_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the claim is a partial resubmit. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ORIG_HAR_RES_ACT_ID
columns.description: Stores the original hospital account when research charges have been added to the account.

columns.name: EXPECTED_PYMT
columns.description: Claim level expected reimbursement.

columns.name: DRG_ID
columns.description: Diagnosis related group for this claim.

columns.name: DRG_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.

columns.name: CLAIM_BILLED_AMOUNT
columns.description: Billed amount determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLM_CONTRACTUAL
columns.description: Contractual amount determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLM_EXPECTED_PRICE
columns.description: Expected amount determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_PMT_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Payment method determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Fee Schedule


Capitation Table


Percent of Billed


Per Diem


Percent of Fee Schedule


Minimum of Fee Schedules


Weighted Fee Schedule


Global Case Rate


None


Minimum of Options


Percentage After Threshold


Case Rate


Percent of Billed - Apply Modifiers


PPS Pricing


Extension Only


Maximum of Fee Schedules


Maximum of Options


Minimum of Fee Schedules with Floor Price


APC/APG Weight x Rate


DME Rental


DME Rental - Legacy Pricing


Percent of Invoice/External Amount

columns.name: CLAIM_PRIM_PMT_RATE
columns.description: Primary payment rate determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLM_PRIMARY_CVD_QTY
columns.description: Quantity covered by primary method. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLM_ADDL_PMT_MTHDS
columns.description: Additional payment methods. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLM_ADDL_PMT_RATES
columns.description: Additional payment rates. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLM_ADDL_CVD_QTY
columns.description: Additional payment quantity. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLM_LINE_PNLTY_PER
columns.description: Line/Service level penalties imposed on the claim. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_LATE_DAYS
columns.description: Late submission days. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLM_SUB_PNLTY_PER
columns.description: Late submission penalty percent applied. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLM_U_AND_C_AMT
columns.description: Usual and customary amount for the claim. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_INS_PORTION
columns.description: Insurance portion of the expected amount. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLM_PATIENT_PORTION
columns.description: Portion of the expected amount the patient is responsible for. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_MTHD_DESC
columns.description: A text description of the method used to price the claim.  Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_TERM_DESC
columns.description: This item stores the term description from the matching contract line.

columns.name: OPERATING_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the operating provider to go onto the uniform billing claim.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the contract that was used for this claim. Zero means that the contract is from an external system.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.

columns.name: CONTRACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A numerical representation of the contact date for the contract used in this claim. Used to help link to the VEN_NET_CONT_SVC table.

columns.name: CONTRACT_USED_DT
columns.description: The date that the contract was used for this claim.

columns.name: CONTRACT_NOT_USED
columns.description: Indicates whether the contract was used for this claim. Y indicates that the contract was not used.

columns.name: EDITED_TOB
columns.description: Indicates the claim type of bill was edited.

columns.name: EDITED_EOB
columns.description: Indicates the claim explanation of benefits was edited.

columns.name: MAIL_ADDR1
columns.description: First line of the mailing address for a given claim record.

columns.name: MAIL_ADDR2
columns.description: Second line of the mailing address for a given claim record.

columns.name: REIMB_COST_THRESH
columns.description: The cost threshold of this claim's outlier data. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: REIMB_COST_OUT
columns.description: The cost outlier of this claim's outlier data. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: REIMB_DAY_THRESH
columns.description: The day threshold of this claim's outlier data. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: REIMB_DAY_OUT
columns.description: The day outlier of this claim's outlier data. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: REIMB_OTH_THRESH
columns.description: The other threshold of this claim's outlier data. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: REIMB_OTH_OUT
columns.description: The other outlier of this claim's outlier data. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.

columns.name: MAIL_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the mailing address country.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EXPECT_PAT_RESP_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total expected patient responsibility for the claim.
